devfest18DetailsSmall: An online conference focused on building soft skills and preparing for a post pandemic world

overviewSection.title: Sessions
overviewSection.des: 8 brilliant sesions, dedicated to Soft Skills, CV crafting and Lots more

overviewSection.title: Showcases
overviewSection.des: Demo zone with the latest of Google tech: Big Data, face recognition, VR, IoT - all in one place

overviewSection.title: Workshops
overviewSection.des: 2 workshops to get your hands dirty and create a nice prototype

overviewSection.title: Networking
overviewSection.des: Work hard and enjoy NeXt Conference is the best place to meet new people

states.title: After the Pandemic What is NeXt?
states.des: The NeXt Conference brings together people who shape the future of Work for 4 days of sessions, workshops and networking. Described by many as 'NeXt Conference', our team creates a Conference where we all can meet up for inspiration and experience sharing.

speakerSection.title: Our lineup of leading professionals and achievers
speakerSection.des: Get ready to be inspired by speakers who will help you gain important life skills and also learn from their experiences. Stay tuned as we add more speakers to our lineup

sessionsSection.title: Our Theme & Sessions
sessionsSection.des: Sessions covers different soft skills ranging from CV writing, leadership skills to Entrepreneurial skills. These skills have always been downplayed but proves to be essential and very important to anyone preparing for the post pandemic world
